steps.content: In the video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L1vXCYZAYYM, what is the highest number of bird species to be on camera simultaneously?

plan: Watch the video at the provided link to identify the scenes with bird species.
Take note of the timestamps where multiple bird species appear on camera.
Count the number of different bird species visible in each relevant scene.
Determine the highest count of bird species observed simultaneously in any scene.

steps.text:
Title:  - YouTube
=======================
# YouTube

### Video Metadata
- **Keywords:** video, sharing, camera phone, video phone, free, upload

### Description
Emperor Penguin Chicks and Adelie Penguins stand up to Giant Petrel

The emperor penguin chicks are left to fend for themselves and stand up against a giant petrel with the help of a feisty Adelie.

From our programme 'Spy in the Snow' for the BBC.

Narrated by David Tennant

Produced by Matthew Gordon

Creative Director: John Downer

Follow John Downer Productions:

Twitter   / johndownerprod
Facebook   / johndownerproductions
Instagram   / johndownerproductions
